description:
PyCon Hong Kong 2017 Talk

How I battle with Hong Kong Open Data in Python - by Ho Wa Wong

the very brief background of g0vhk.io and open data problem in HK
pdfminer demonstration and real life example
web scraping and running scraper in morph.io
haystack & django
